tool_description: Introducing Ava, Max, and Max- Large the latest addition to our SentiX family of sentiment analysis models with the capability to handle English, French, Spanish, German, and Portuguese, SentiX is a versatile AI tool that empowers businesses and researchers to gain valuable insights from text data in various applications.
name: SentiX
title: SentiX

api_list.name: Max-Large (Batch Processing)
api_list.description: Analyze Sentiment for multiple texts in multiple languages, including English, French, Spanish, German, and Portuguese.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sentix.p.rapidapi.com/max_large/batch"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sentix.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Max-Large Analyze Text

api_list.name: Max Analyze Text - Batch
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to perform sentiment analysis on multiple text inputs in a batch.

api_list.name: Analyze Text - Batch
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to analyze multiple text inputs in a batch and obtain their sentiment categories.
